remarks: Translate the relation compatibility relation to a quotient set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ercpbl.r $e |- ( ph -> .~ Er V ) $.
ercpbl.v $e |- ( ph -> V e. _V ) $.
ercpbl.f $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> [ x ] .~ ) $.
erlecpbl.e $e |- ( ph -> ( ( A .~ C /\ B .~ D ) -> ( A N B <-> C N D ) ) ) $.
erlecpbl $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) /\ ( C e. V /\ D e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` A ) = ( F ` C ) /\ ( F ` B ) = ( F ` D ) ) -> ( A N B <-> C N D ) ) ) $.
$d .~ x $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
